description.component: Hero card component and pattern with media and content.

card_border.name: Card Border
card_border.description: Add a default border to the card.

padded.name: Padded
padded.description: Add a default padding to the card.

media_position.name: Media position
media_position.description: Choose the location of the media from (overlay|start|end|top|bottom).

media.name: Card media
media.description: The media image/video slot for the card.

content.name: Card content
content.slots: The content slot for the card.

utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
utility_classes.description: Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes for the main Card wrapper. E.g. `mb-3 shadow-lg` ( Do not add `card`).

media_utility_classes.name: Media Utility Classes
media_utility_classes.description: Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes for the Card Media region wrapper. E.g. `bg-secondary mb-3` ( Do not add `card-img`).

content_utility_classes.name: Content Utility Classes
content_utility_classes.description: Use to add extra Bootstrap utility classes for the Card Content region wrapper. E.g. `w-75 mb-3 overflow-y-hidden`  ( Do not add `card-body`).

card_attributes.name: Card Attributes
card_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the card element.

content_attributes.name: Content Attributes
content_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the content element.
